Наверное это самое лучшее из Free to play игр, и  я сейчас расскажу почему
Плюсы :
Игра бесплатная
Множество режимов и карт
Есть моды на игру(Там модели установить и т.д)
======================================================
Кстати, в игре есть много религий ну или что-то подобное.

К примеру на 2fort(карта в игре)
Есть виды животных Акулы пирычи
Там еще Путисы(мирный народ любищий танцевать конгу и вприсядку, кидают бутеры тем самым помогают людям)
Ну вот и всё, короче говоря игра супер, советую)

下列是此游戏的真正玩法:
狗头满图跑
士兵航天员
医生玩近战
哨塔门前放
狙击打身体
胖子玩赛跑
呆毛贴脸炸
拍肉无脑烧
间谍正面肝
下列是此游戏真名:
TFGO
帽子要塞
跳舞要塞
换装要塞
拍肉要塞
大佬要塞
下列是我对刚刚玩的萌新的一些建议:
1.不要被琳琅满目的箱子和每周一送的箱子骗了 他们只是想要你的钱！
2.不要试图在商店购买除钥匙以外的任何东西(市场的钥匙好像便宜几毛钱)
3.无论你玩什么兵种，回头看看总是对的(spy爆菊花)
4.工程可以把迷你哨塔或者普通哨塔放在敌人进过的转角会有意想不到的效果
5.玩火焰兵时要利用好右键，用好右键了天不怕地不怕
6.多照顾队友，要平衡兵种，医生也是个不错的职业(跟dalao冲锋陷阵真爽)
7.spy背刺除了无敌以外背刺可以秒杀所有职业
8.士兵练好火箭跳可以更好的占点，占领有利位置
9.当年玩火焰兵时，你可以有事没事往工程师的建筑周围烧一下，会有意想不到的效果(其他兵种也一样)
10.你可以当个菜鸟，但是帽子饰品绝对不能少

166 hrs on record
This is a well made, stylized, team based first person shooter. Teamwork is needed to win at higher levels of play, though lone wolfing is fine on lower skill levels such as on most public servers. There are 9 classes to choose from. Each class has unique weapons and abilities that allow each to fill a unique roll as part of a larger team. This provides for a challenging and rewarding experience when faced against opponents of similar or better skill levels.

There are two official modes of play: player versus player and 'Mann Versus Machine'.

Player versus player is a mode where one team of players battles against another team of players. Within this mode, there are different types of maps. Each type of map has it's own objectives for both teams to achieve.

'Mann Versus Machine' is a mode where a team of up to 6 players battles against waves of bots. Players collect money from destroyed bots. The money is divided equally among players in the team and can be used to purchase upgrades and abilities for the next wave of bots. The pay to play sub-mode, "Mann Up", gives rewards upon completing a "tour".

In addition to the official modes of play, there are several player made mods that introduce other modes of play such as 'Versus Saxton Hale', where a team of players battles against a player playing as a character named Saxton Hale; 'Dodge Ball', where two teams of players playing as Pyros must airblast rockets and other projectiles back and forth in order to stay alive; 'Zombie Mod', where a team of players must make it to the end of the map without dying to zombies that are played by other players; to name just a few of the many player made mods available.

In addition to game play, players will randomly receive free items from the game. Some of the free items given out are weapons, hats and crates. Hats can be worn by a class to change the appearance of that class. Crates can be opened with a key. Keys can be purchased from the Mann Co Store or from the Steam Community Market or traded for from another player. Most crates will list which items can be found within them.

The game has several communities for a player to choose from if a community is what you are looking for. The game is easy to pick up and play, either alone or with friends, yet has a depth of play that will keep you from becoming bored too quickly. The dynamics between the different classes, weapons, play styles, skill levels, modes and maps provides content for many hours of play. thanks for reading

Классная,проработанная,мультяшная и бесплатная игра.
 Team Fortress 2-доволно неплохой шутер от первого лица.
В игре есть 9 своеобразных классов.
Аудитория хорошая,все нормально играют.
К тому же очень странно,что такая игра бесплатная-я бы отдал за нее где то 150р
Донат конечно есть,но он не обязателен.
Очень большой и классный выбор оружия и одежды.
Всем рекомендую.

Ahora que he estado mas de 100hs disfrutando de este producto le dedico un analisis:

Quizas este sea uno de los mejores juegos creados en la historia de los FPS (Tardo unos años en crearse, pero valio la pena).
Quisiera destacar su jugabilidad, ya que es simple y facil de entender. A lo largo de los años el juego fue creciendo tanto en contenido como en jugadores. Divertido en la mayoria de los aspectos.
Lo unico que me disgusto del juego es el pagar por la mayoria de las cosas (pinturas, tickets,etc) 
En conclusion, me diverti mucho con mis amigos, la pasamos genial y espero que este juego siga avanzando con el tiempo. Eso es todo.
10/10

Muy buen juego.

When I first heared of TF2, I had to play it, but it was only on steam so I set a steam account for myself. It was F2P when I first heard of it, so I did not have to spend a single penny, It was the most addictive game I ever played, I played it every morning, it is super fantastic. The gameplay is fast, it's fun, it's original. There 9 classes with different stats, abilities, wapons and hats, don't forget hats. The updates on this game are really exciting, fixing bugs, new weapons, maps, hats, etc. If you truely want to experience TF2, you must spend some money to do so.Anyways, since TF2 is F2P, so the community is one of the biggest in Steam. expect alot of F2P kids who yammer on the mike, and take the game too seriously even though it's a casual game. The gamemodes are original such as the payload mode, Mann vs. Machine, Control Points. Some non-official gamemodes are popular in TF2, such as x10 where weapon stats are multiplied by 10, vs Saxton Hale mode, a mode where a team fights against a boss which is a randomly selected player to play as Saxton Hale or some other boss such as the easter bunny, Christian Brutal Sniper, Painis Cupcake, the Vagineer,  Bonk Boy, Demopan etc. Anyways TF2 is really fun, it's still a thing especially the game is over 10 years old now. Anyways play the game, in my opinion, a Steam user is not a real steam user until they've played TF2. If Steam had one game to represent itself, TF2 would be the choice.




26/11/2019 Update

Valve, it has been 2 years since TF2's last major update not including Christmas, Halloween, season events, and various patches. Please release a new update and fix the unusual hat inflation problem as well.
